attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you don't work, you don't vote. Why should the unemployed parasites of the UK  who haven't contributed anything towards the country get a say in how it's run!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
